original_title: Sri Lanka coconut auction prices down 0.8-pct
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s coconut auction prices fell by 0.8 percent after the New Year holidays, at an auction last week, data showed.
The average price for 1,000 nuts fell to 72,796.05 from 73,367.88 a week earlier at the weekly auction conducted by Sri Lanka’s Coconut Development Authority on April 20.
The highest price was 82,900 rupees for 1,000 nuts down from the previous week’s 85,100 rupees, while the lowest was 66,000 up from 65,000 rupees.
The auction offered 969,817 coconuts and 770,670 nuts were sold. (Colombo/April23/2023)
